Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO GOVERNMENTAL OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to increasing the discretionary purchasing threshold for certified minority and women-owned business enterprises in New York city
Summary: Increases the discretionary purchasing threshold for certified minority and women-owned business enterprises in New York city to $1.5 million.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the New York city charter, in relation to discretionary purchasing thresholds for certified minority and women-owned business enterprises
